long_description: for more than 20 years we have been creating and developing solutions and technologies designed to build a transparent link between marketing investments and sales. adv is the leading communication group in russia and is the partner of international holdings of ipg and havas. adv group is a collaboration of experts in the fields of technologies, media, marketing strategy and creativity. we bring together teams of people with common goals to achieve inspirational business results for brands. be the #1 company in russian marketing industry in the eyes of our clients and partners. by allowing business and consumers to better understand each other and actively interact, we help our clients become the best in their field. people are the core of any communication business. we invest in intelligent, ambitious and determined professionals who are ready to take the lead and think free of stereotypes. we're looking for the most advanced solutions on the market and build our own products. smart and hi-tech marketing – that's what we offer to our clients.
